This super hold clay does exactly what it says on the tin, offering immediate grip and hold combined with a long lasting, "ULTRA MATTE" finish. The fragrance is sweet and subtle, with notes of vanilla and raspberries.

entry.title: Dapper Dan Matt Paste 50ml
entry.summary:
Vendor: Dapper Dan
Type: Pomade & Hair Products
Price: 7.50

Dapper Dan Matt Paste is our flagship product and you will not find a better or more versatile matt styler.
It really is that good; messy styles, partings, quiffs, this product will do it all!
 
Strong yet flexible hold with a smooth and easy application. Washes out easily. Try it and you will not be disappointed.

Fragrance: Vintage cologne

entry.title: Dapper Dan Deluxe Pomade 50ml
entry.summary:
Vendor: Dapper Dan
Type: Pomade & Hair Products
Price: 7.50

The perfect flexible pomade for those who appreciate a professional slick look with no greasiness or flakiness.

Water based, it offers the hold and shine of some other more waxy and greasy pomades but will wash out of your hair instantly.

Deluxe Pomade is versatile and can be adapted to suit your chosen style. Use a small amount on dry hair for a natural shine or simply use more pomade for that authentic 1930's look. 

This product will set your style in place all day but unlike many other water based pomades it will not harden too much. Deluxe Pomade can be re-combed at any point although we do recommend a wet comb be used to restyle with more ease.
  • Water Based
  • Washes out easily
  • Fragrance: Citrus and Vanilla

entry.title: Dapper Dan Grooming Tonic 250ml
entry.summary:
Vendor: Dapper Dan
Type: Pomade & Hair Products
Price: 12.50

Dapper Dan Grooming Tonic contains Argan Oil and Witch Hazel to condition the hair whilst adding volume and texture. Perfect for all hair types, simply add a few drops onto your hands then apply evenly through damp hair. Leave to dry for loose texture or blow-dry for natural volume and hold.

Grooming Tonic works hand-in-hand with our Deluxe Pomade or Heavy Hold Pomade!

Fragrance: Vanilla and Tonka Bean.

Dapper Dan Aftershave Balm contains Aloe Vera, Allantoin and Chamomile to reduce irritation caused by shaving.

It soothes and moisturizes the skin post-shave, and works equally well as a daily moisturizer.

Cruelty-free.

Made in England

entry.title: Dapper Dan Ultra Matte Texture Dust (20G)
entry.summary:
Vendor: Dapper Dan
Type: Pomade & Hair Products
Price: 10.00

DESCRIPTION & FEATURES

Dapper Dan Texture Dust is a dry hair styling powder creating an instant volume,  naturally looking dry texture and a firm, long-lasting. Its water-based formula makes its application and washing out an easy process. 

 

DIRECTIONS OF USE:

Apply a small amount into palms, spread evenly through dry or damp hair. Style as required. 

INGREDIENTS:

Aqua, Silica Silylate, Sodium Chloride, Hydrated Silica, Parfum, DMDM Hydantoin, Linalool, Lomonene, Butylphenyl Methylpropional, Benzyl Salicylate, Hexyl Cinnamal.

Cruelty-free.

Made in England

entry.title: Dapper Dan Ultra Matte Super Hold Clay (100ml/3.38oz)
entry.summary:
Vendor: Dapper Dan
Type: Pomade & Hair Products
Price: 12.50

DESCRIPTION & FEATURES

Dapper Dan Super Hold Clay is the perfect hair styling product to keep hair in place all day long. It adds tons of body due to the presence of Kaolin without weighing the hair down.

Dapper Dan Super Hold Clay leaves the hair with an ultra-matte finish and a sweet scent due to vanilla and raspberry notes used.

 

DIRECTIONS OF USE:

Apply a small amount into palms, spread evenly through dry or damp hair. Style as required. 

KEY INGREDIENTS:

  • Kaolin
  • Beeswax

INGREDIENTS:

Kaolin, Aqua (Water), Cera Alba (Beeswax), Petrolatum, VP/VA Copolymer, Lanolin, Cetearyl Alcohol, PVP, PEG-7 Glyceryl Cocoate, Parfum (Fragrance), Phenoxyethanol, Benzyl Alcohol, Ethylhexyglycerin, Hydroxyethyl Acrylate/Sodium Acryloyldimethyl Taurate Copolymer, Squalane, Polysorbate 60, Cotronellol, Geraniol, Limonene, Linalool

Cruelty-free.

Made in England

entry.title: Dapper Dan Sea Salt Hair Spray (200ml)
entry.summary:
Vendor: Dapper Dan
Type: Pomade & Hair Products
Price: 10.50

Dapper Dan Sea Salt Spray works on its own or together with your favourite Dapper Dan Styling product.

Directions of Use:

Simply spray onto damp hair and leave to dry for a natural matte texture. Alternatively, the Dapper Dan Sea Salt Spray can be blow-dried into the hair to create fantastic thickness, volume and hold.

Fragrance: Classic Sandalwood

entry.title: Dapper Dan Hair Pomade Retail Display
entry.summary:
Vendor: Dapper Dan
Type: Pomade & Hair Products
Price: 300.40

Dapper Dan's Four Channel Display Unit is a must-have for businesses that carry products for the English manufacturer's signature line. 
 
The Display Channel houses up to four rows of Dapper Dan pomades, clays, or matts. It also is capable of holding beard oils, an excellent option for those seeking to add variety to their catalog.
  
The vintage tin is designed specifically by Dapper Dan to complement their products and present them in a manner that's both appealing and organized, leading to additional revenue for your business. 
  
Dapper Dan's best-selling products come from Sheffield, England.

entry.title: Dapper Dan Vegetable Soap - 190 Grams
entry.summary:
Vendor: Dapper Dan
Type: Men's Bodycare
Price: 8.00

Lathering skin with the right soap is a pure luxury, which is why Dapper Dan has taken their expertise in making hair products and channeled it towards making this remarkable organic soap. 
  
The soothing lemongrass and limes fragrance draws inspiration from classic gentlemen's products without carrying an overbearing scent. It also features vintage packaging that bears the rustic charm that gentlemen crave without compromising authentic quality. 
   
(190g) 
   
Proudly made in England.

entry.title: Dapper Dan Heavy Hold Pomade (100ml/3.38oz)
entry.summary:
Vendor: Dapper Dan
Type: Pomade & Hair Products
Price: 12.50

Dapper Dan's famous line of pomades includes this relentless Heavy Hold edition, a must-have for men with the most unagreeable hair.  

The pomade is a petroleum-free and oil-based mixture that provides a remarkably firm hold designed to keep hair in its sculpted form throughout the day while maintaining a vibrant shine. 

Despite being oil-based, Dapper Dan Heavy Hold Pomade is water-based, making it easy to wash out the first time and doesn’t leave any greasy residues! 

Dapper Dan products make an excellent addition to retail counters and bear the vintage charm for gentlemen with a soft spot for an era bygone.

Cruelty-free.

Made in England

entry.title: Dapper Dan Sawcut Styling Comb
entry.summary:
Vendor: Dapper Dan
Type: Pocket Combs
Price: 7.50

Dapper Dan's pomades, matt pastes, and clays have created millions of perfect hairstyles, which is why Dapper Dan brings forth a finely crafted, vintage-inspired Sawcut Styling Comb.
 
This comb is designed specifically to move comfortably across scalps while moving easily through hair. It carries thicker teeth to form hair, and thinner teeth to provide precise results when necessary. 
 
(170mm x 30mm)  
   

Cruelty-free.

Made in England
